thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Helping Clients ‘Buy Low, Sell High’

author: wsjcom
title: Helping Clients ‘Buy Low, Sell High’
text:
Paul Baumbach is the director of investments at Mallard Financial Partners in Newark, Del. Voices is an occasional feature of edited excerpts in which wealth managers address issues of interest to the advisory community. As told to Jacob Meade.
My firm employs a quarterly rebalancing program to help clients embrace the “buy low, sell high” mode of investing. But the program also helps interested clients buy the dips that occur between their quarterly rebalancing cycle.
...
